ComicInfo.Penciller: Gabriel Hernandez Walta,Gabriel H. Walta,Gabriel H. Walta
ComicInfo.Summary:
JEFF LEMIRE and GABRIEL HERNÁNDEZ WALTAs hit series continues its thrilling new story arc!
While Agent Weaver attempts to search for the vanished pair, Birdie and Dom are trapped by another horde of monsters at the roadside circus. There, they encounter a truly mind-melting individual who might be an ally in their escape…but might also be another aspect of the terrible madness surrounding them.
ComicInfo.Title: Mirror in the Bathroom
